item.title: The stock of the day is a Chinese EV play up 12% after revealing pictures of a new SUV
item.description: With this move, Li's stock is up about 22% in 2025.

item.title: Nvidia is expected to move 10% in either direction on earnings. How to trade it
item.description: Nishant Pant describes an iron condor trade in the bull market leader.
